I want to create a line chart or area chart that has a linear x axis and a linear y axis.  When I try to create this type of chart I get the following exception:

Caused by: org.eclipse.birt.chart.exception.ChartException: Lines may not be rendered on a value scale 
       at org.eclipse.birt.chart.render.Line.renderSeries(Line.java:135) 

I am not sure why these types of charts are not allowed since they are used widely in many business domains.

I suggest cancelling this bug.
Area/Line chart can't use a linear axis as X axis, since we can't render the line or  polygon with two groups of continuous data, but the point. Users can use a scatter chart instead.
Agree to cancel. Scatter charts already provide the needed functionality.
